easy.q: I have four legs but I never walk. I come in a chair and a stool. What am I?
easy.hint: Look under you when you sit.

medium.q: I am a word of letters three; add two, and fewer there will be. What word am I?
medium.hint: Think of how adding letters changes meaning.

hard.q: A clock and a calendar share a secret. If today is a Tuesday and next month has 31 days, what is the probability that the 15th is a Thursday? (Assume all days equally likely and ignore leap years.)
hard.hint: Count the days of the week for the 15th across a typical month.
